bugs.summary: Implement HTMLVideoElement.requestVideoFrameCallback()
Enable DRM wpt tests on Windows by using PlayReady
Add Autoplay to default logging
Test case takes two minutes to load
Make more stylo code Gecko-specific at compile-time
Create a struct to contain the console message location / JS caller
Timeout in NetworkWebsocket fuzzer
add jsapi to reset seed for math.random

Perma Android 13.0 Pixel5 Arm7 [tier 2] tests/jit-test/jit-test/tests/wasm/js-promise-integration/js-promise-integration.new.js | # Suspend once (code 139, args "--setpref=wasm_js_promise_integration=true") [0.2 s]
Expose `hadOutOfMemory` flag in JS shell and reset it in JSRT
Update test262 (August 1, 2024)
Support Float32<>Float16 conversions in ARM32
Minor clean up for inline intrinsic size APIs
Ship the vendored transformers/onnx lib in release

Perma [tier 2] browser/components/genai/tests/browser/browser_chat_shortcuts.js | single tracking bug
Fix ML IndexedDB Cache Size Estimation to Match Actual Data Size
Fix the network error in test in Linux
Add support for padding/border/margin on MathML elements
Upgrade Firefox 130 to use NSS 3.103
Add QuotaManager::Initialize(Persistent|Temporary)Origin methods
Update MacTouchBar file path in the Touch Bar Firefox Source Docs page to use esmified one
Fix focus stealing issue on X11

Typo in Tracer sidebar and tracer test (interation -> interaction)

Restore the preloading of mozavcodec.dll and mozavutil.dll in content processes
Update Google Accompanist to version 0.34.0
[Password manager] When saving a new suggested password, the "update" prompt is displayed
Close the Debug Drawer when the back button is pressed or the back gesture is used
